Will You Marry Me?

07-19-2020

Seventh Promise

Carrie,

Nearly four years ago, we both agreed to six promises. These promises were wide ranging, but were completely encapsulating our relationship.

  • We would not laugh at each other.
  • We never tell anyone our secrets.
  • We never tickle each other.
  • We never hit below the belt.
  • We will never try to change one another.

And finally,

  • We never stop loving each other.

I think we should add another to this list of promises.

Caroline Nicole Kirby, will you promise to share our love with the rest of the world?

You Know I’m Yours.

– David
